author: MICHAEL R. SISAK and MARINA VILLENEUVE / AP
title: New York State Surpasses 1,000 Coronavirus Deaths
description: New York state's death toll from the coronavirus outbreak surged above 1,000, less than a month after the state's first case was detected
content:
(NEW YORK) — New York state’s death toll from the coronavirus outbreak surged Sunday above 1,000, less than a month after the first case was detected in the state.
New York City reported in the evening that its toll had risen to 776. The total number of stat… [+6817 chars]
